ComicInfo.Title: An Unlikely Champion; The Gift; One On One
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-28 18:10:43. [CVDB200772] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 20:26:20. [Issue ID 289196]

ComicInfo.Summary:
An Unlikely Champion: Seeking help to defeat the Mad Magician Berecki, The Mink raises an army of zombies to find the costumed vigilante Savage Squirrel.
The Gift: The story of how Amy was sold to The Mistress.
One On One: A male and a female warrior are matched in a contest to see who can make the other climax first. Unknown to everyone, the two are former lovers.
